profileAlternative.name: Spyros Argyroiliopoulos
profileAlternative.headline: Java Developer
profileAlternative.summary:
Java Full Stack Web Developer, bright, self-driven, ambitious, enthusiastic, professional, reliable, clear thinking with strong attention to detail and excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Eager to work with bleeding-edge technologies.
Agile methodology and Scrum practitioner. Having demonstrated mathematical, programming and business background, able to multi-task and thrive in dynamic environments.
A strong team player with excellent communication skills.

positions.title: Java Developer
positions.description:
Building an agile, modular, future-ready interactive platform, upscaling the modern lottery experience.

Projects:
2019- present: Irish National Lottery: https://www.lottery.ie/
Project: React Native Mobile App - Integration Layer
Details: [Spring Boot, Kong API Gateway, Docker, Stateless Integration Layer, Microservices, Automation Testing, Gradle]

2018-2019: Illinois State Lottery: https://www.illinoislottery.com/
Project: iLottery Platform - Financials Team - Financial Integrations
Details: [Spring Boot, Postgres, Docker, Rest Application, Modular Monolith, Automation Testing, Gradle, Scrum]

2016-2018: Loterie Romande: https://jeux.loro.ch/
Project: iLottery Platform - Wallet Service, Prize Service, Admin Portal - Financial Integrations
Details: [Spring, Spring MVC, Cassandra, Rest Applications, Microservices, Automation Testing, Gradle, Scrum@Scale]

…
see more

educations.title: Ethnikon kai Kapodistriakon Panepistimion Athinon / University of Athens

given.text:
I had the privilege of working with Spyros Argyroiliopoulos in a SCRUM Team for more than one year at Camelot Global. Spyros is proactive, result oriented, responsible and technically sound employee and he is always ready to put all his energy and time to get the job done. He has an exceptional troubleshooting and analytical skill. Spyros is a great asset to any company.
…
See more

Spyros and I worked together as part of a geographically dispersed SCRUM team. As a member of the Development team, I’ve always found Spyros to be extremely professional and willing to offer several ideas and solutions in order to meet the customer requirements. As a Product Owner, I always found that he was able to communicate very well the options available given the technical constraints and helped me arrive at optimal solutions. I’m impressed with his enthusiastic approach to his work and would welcome the opportunity to work with him again in the future.
…
See more
